property.name: editable
property.description: A flag that indicates whether or not the user can edit items in the data provider

property.name: editedItemPosition
property.description: The column and row index of the item renderer for the data provider item being edited, if any.

property.name: editedItemRenderer
property.description: A reference to the item renderer in the DataGrid control whose item is currently being edited.

property.name: editorDataField
property.description: The name of the property of the item editor that contains the new data for the list item.

property.name: editorHeightOffset
property.description: The height of the item editor, in pixels, relative to the size of the item renderer.

property.name: editorUsesEnterKey
property.description: A flag that indicates whether the item editor uses Enter key.

property.name: editorWidthOffset
property.description: The width of the item editor, in pixels, relative to the size of the item renderer.

property.name: editorXOffset
property.description: The x location of the upper-left corner of the item editor, in pixels, relative to the upper-left corner of the item.

property.name: editorYOffset
property.description: The y location of the upper-left corner of the item editor, in pixels, relative to the upper-left corner of the item.

property.name: enableIME
property.description: A flag that indicates whether the IME should be enabled when the component receives focus.

property.name: imeMode
property.description: Specifies the IME (input method editor) mode.

property.name: itemEditor
property.description: The class factory for the item editor to use for the control, if the editable property is set to true.

property.name: itemEditorInstance
property.description: A reference to the currently active instance of the item editor, if it exists.

property.name: rendererIsEditor
property.description: Specifies whether the item renderer is also an item editor.
